name: iqdb Fruity
description: Features modern-looking match cards. Comes in some fruity colors.
css: @-moz-document domain("iqdb.org"){div table,div.pages>div{height:300px;width:162px}@font-face{font-family:Raleway;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:local('Raleway'),local('Raleway-Regular'),url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/raleway/v11/yQiAaD56cjx1AooMTSghGfY6323mHUZFJMgTvxaG2iE.woff2) format('woff2')}@font-face{font-family:Raleway;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:local('Raleway'),local('Raleway-Regular'),url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/raleway/v11/0dTEPzkLWceF7z0koJaX1A.woff2) format('woff2')}html{font-family:Raleway,sans-serif;color:#fff}body{background:#212936;margin:0 0 4px;text-align:center}h1{margin-top:16px;text-transform:lowercase}h1::before{content:"iqdb - ";color:#06c}h1:first-letter{text-transform:capitalize;color:#06c}ul{width:350px}p:not(.flow){margin-bottom:25px}a{color:#1380ec;text-decoration:none}a:hover{color:#0080ff;text-decoration:underline}body form>*,body>:not(.pages):not(#more1){text-align:center;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto}div#show1{margin-bottom:20px}div.pages{padding:20px 0;background:#212c2c;box-sizing:border-box;border:0 solid grey;border-top-width:1px;border-bottom-width:1px;box-shadow:inset 0 0 40px -15px #FFF}div.pages div *{font-size:.9755em;padding:0;margin:0}div.pages>div{margin:0 20px 25px;box-shadow:0 0 30px -10px #FFF}div table{background:#142643;border-width:1px;border-radius:5px;border-collapse:separate;border-spacing:0;border-color:grey!important}div.pages table{height:100%;overflow:hidden}div.pages table th{text-align:center;vertical-align:middle}div.pages table td{padding:0 2px}div#pages div table tbody>:nth-child(-n+2),div.pages div table tbody>:first-child{background:#1d242f}div#pages div table tbody>tr:nth-of-type(3) img,div.pages:not(#pages) div table tbody>tr:nth-of-type(2) img{margin-right:5px}/*[[clrblock]]*/}

style_setting_options.label: Blueberry (Dark blue)
style_setting_options.value: html{color:#fff}body{background:#212936}h1::before,h1:first-letter{color:#06c}a{color:#1380ec}a:hover{color:#0080ff}div.pages{background:#212c2c;box-shadow:inset 0 0 40px -15px #FFF}div.pages>div{box-shadow:0 0 30px -10px #FFF}div table{background:#142643}div#pages div table tbody>:nth-child(-n+2),div.pages div table tbody>:first-child{background:#1d242f}

style_setting_options.label: Mikan (Light orange)
style_setting_options.value: html{color:#000}body{background:#ffebcc}h1::before,h1:first-letter{color:#F39200}a{color:#f93}a:hover{color:#e67300}div.pages{background:#fff5e6;box-shadow:inset 0 0 40px -15px #000}div.pages>div{box-shadow:0 0 30px -10px #000}div table{background:#FFF9E6}div#pages div table tbody>:nth-child(-n+2),div.pages div table tbody>:first-child{background:#ffe6cc}
